content: of 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 times until 48 sts remain 6 sts in each section then work round 2 four times until 16 sts remain next round k2tog around 8 sts break yarn and thread tail through remaining live sts to close top of hat removing markers wet block the toque to even out the colourwork pattern and smooth out crown decreases add a few tablespoons of white vinegar to the soaking water to prevent colours from bleeding weave in your ends and wear your hat out on an adventure check out the matching clayoquot cardigan pattern > key & abbreviations chart a chart b work rounds 1-3 work rounds indicated for your size mc - knit with main colour cc1 - knit with contrast colour 1 cc2 - knit with contrast colour 2 4 st repeat dpns - double pointed p - purl needles pm - place marker k - knit st s - stitch es k2tog - knit 2 together m1 - make 1 stitch using your preferred method chart notes charts are read from right to left all stitches are knit when working chart b refer to pattern instuctions for which rounds to work for your size 2 st repeat clayoquot toque from road trip 2 © tin can knits 2014 www tincanknits com in-depth tutorials excellent support fabulous free patterns join us tin can knits in vancouver + edinburgh www tincanknits com
